sentences.en: "Highly inflammable," it says on the spare canister.
sentences.cn: 备用罐上写着“高度易燃”。

sentences.en: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.cn: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

sentences.en: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.cn: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.en: Give me the trunk key and I'll get the spare.
sentences.cn: 把行李箱的钥匙给我,我去拿一下备胎.

sentences.en: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.cn: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.en: He could have taken a spare key.
sentences.cn: 他本该带上一把备用钥匙的。

sentences.en: I didn't have much money going spare.
sentences.cn: 我没多少闲钱。

sentences.en: I didn't have much money going spare.
sentences.cn: 我没多少闲钱。

sentences.en: I wanted to spare Frances the embarrassment of discussing this subject.
sentences.cn: 讨论这个话题太尴尬，我不想让弗朗西斯难堪。

sentences.en: I'm as fit as a fiddle — with energy to spare.
sentences.cn: 我非常健康——精力充沛。

sentences.en: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.cn: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.en: In the future the machines will need spare parts and maintenance.
sentences.cn: 这些机器将来会需要备件和维修保养。

sentences.en: It's not as if he has money to spare.
sentences.cn: 他又不是有什么余钱。

sentences.en: Officials say they'll spare no expense to prevent another riot.
sentences.cn: 官员说他们会不惜一切地阻止再次发生暴乱。

sentences.en: Remove wheelnuts, let down tyre, put on spare.
sentences.cn: 拧下车轮螺母，放掉车胎的气，换上备用胎。

sentences.en: She said that she could only spare 35 minutes for our meeting.
sentences.cn: 她说她只能抽出35分钟给我们的会议。

sentences.en: She was thin and spare, with a sharply intelligent face.
sentences.cn: 她又高又瘦，一副精明过人的模样。

sentences.en: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.en: spare a thought for our volunteer group at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节别忘了我们的志愿者组织。

sentences.en: The spare bedroom is on the second floor.
sentences.cn: 闲置的卧室在三楼。

sentences.en: The wagons carried spare ammunition.
sentences.cn: 大货车载着备用的弹药。

sentences.en: There was hardly a spare inch of space to be found.
sentences.cn: 几乎找不到一丁点空余的地方。

sentences.en: Use a cheap cut such as spare rib chops.
sentences.cn: 用一块便宜点的肉，比如肋排肉。

sentences.en: We paid our bills and had money to spare.
sentences.cn: 我们付帐后还有节余

sentences.en: When she has a little spare time she enjoys arranging dried flowers.
sentences.cn: 她稍有空闲便喜欢摆弄干花。

sentences.en: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.cn: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

words.tran_cn: 抽出；宽恕；免去；给予（spare的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: go spare Brit. informal 英，非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 在他闲暇的时候；在他业余时间里
备用容量；闲置的生产能力
不遗余力；抽出；宽容；节省

phrases.phrase: spare no expense (或 no expense spared)
spare the rod and spoil the child

trans.tran_cn: 闲置的， 空闲的，备用的，瘦（高）的
trans.tran_en: not being used or not needed at the present time
an additional thing, for example a key, that you keep so that it is available

trans.tran_cn: 留出，剩余，省得，饶恕，使幸免，不吝惜（时间、金钱）
trans.tran_en: If you spare time or another resource for a particular purpose, you make it available for that purpose
to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
